title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 7, pt. 763 - Certified Home Health Agencies, Long Term Home Health Care Programs And Aids Home Care Programs Minimum Standards
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 7, pt. 763

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§201, 225, 2800, 2803, 2803-b, 3600, 3612, 3613[9], 4010; Social Services Law, §363-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
